participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Emily is always striving for excellence in her academics and personal goals.
participant_1.background: i won homecoming queen this year. my current goal is to run a k. i am currently in high school. i make straight as in school. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist.
